summary: A look at the work and surprising success of a four-year-old girl whose paintings have been compared to the likes of Picasso and has raked in hundreds of thousands of dollars.
cast: Amir Bar-Lev|Anthony Brunelli|Elizabeth Cohen|Jonathan Crosby|Ron Curtis Jr.|Michael Kimmelman|Laura Olmstead|Mark Olmstead|Marla Olmstead|Zane Olmstead|Celeste Russi|Tara Sands|Stuart Simpson|Jackie Wescott
title: My Kid Could Paint That
